prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Fourth typical structural details sheet with 11 numbered details covering partition bottom connection to floor, ledger splice, engineered beam-to-post with Simpson CC/ECC post caps, strap holdown configurations (4 sub-details: to header, to drope beam, to flush beam, and standard), steel base plate to foundation with bolt patterns, maximum steel base plate/bolt detail, and post over wood beam with Simpson BC post cap. APPROVED stamp by Anthony Montes - Building Plan Check.
key_content: Detail 4: Partition bot. conn. to floor — 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C., 2x4 plate w/o 16d nails @ 16" O.C. to floor, joist perpendicular and joist parallel configurations
Detail 3: Ledger splice — CL of splice stud & strap, MxTxD strap, double strap splice variant, elevation and perspective views
Detail 1: Engineered beam to post — Simpson CC post cap and ECC post cap, beam per plan, post per plan, strap per plan where occurs, splice where occurs

Detail 5 (D): Typical strap holdown to header — HD strap & nailing per mfr., holdown post per plan (min 4x4), strap around/over header, if end length L > header depth attach strap above and below, see S3.2
Detail 5 (C): Typical strap holdown to drope beam — holdown post min 4x4, if end length L > beam depth strap above bottom of beam and nail accordingly
Detail 5 (B): Typical strap holdown to flush beam — holdown post min 4x4, if end length L > beam depth strap around bottom of beam and nail accordingly
Detail 5 (A): Typical strap holdown — standard configuration, holdown post per plan (min 4x4), HD strap & nailing per mfr.

Detail 11: Steel base plate to foundation — 4x cont. nailer (P.T.), 3/4" DIA stud bolts, 1/2 bolts @ 36" (stagger), threaded stud (welded), alternate machine bolts, 4" from end of wood nailer to center of bolt typical

Detail 10: Maximum steel base plate / bolts — 3/4 DIA threaded stud @ 7-1/4" at 5" x 1/4" PLT, non-shrink grout, 3 trimmers required, 1/2" DIA stud bolts, plan view bolt pattern, 4" from end of wood nailer to CL of stud bolt typical
Detail 9: Post over wood beam — Simpson BC post cap, beam per plan, post per plan
All strap holdowns: minimum 4x4 holdown post, HD strap & nailing per manufacturer
Base plate bolt specs: 1/2" DIA and 3/4" DIA bolts, 36" stagger spacing
Simpson hardware: CC post cap, ECC post cap, BC post cap
APPROVED stamp: Anthony Montes — Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: holdown schedule with uplift values (lbs)
NOT SHOWN: roof-to-wall connection details (hurricane ties / DTC clips)
NOT SHOWN: anchor bolt embedment depth specification

drawing_zones.content: Partition bot. conn. to floor — 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C., 16d nails @ 16" O.C., joist perpendicular and parallel configs
Ledger splice — strap splice and double strap splice, elevation and perspective views
Engineered beam to post — Simpson CC and ECC post caps, beam/post/strap per plan, elevation views
Strap holdowns — 4 sub-details (D: to header, C: to drope beam, B: to flush beam, A: standard), all min 4x4 holdown post, HD strap per mfr.
Typical strap holdown to header — strap around header, if L > header depth attach above and below
Typical strap holdown to drope beam — strap above bottom of beam if L > beam depth
Typical strap holdown to flush beam — strap around bottom of beam if L > beam depth
Typical strap holdown — standard configuration, holdown post min 4x4
Steel base plate to foundation — 3/4" DIA stud bolts, 1/2 bolts @ 36" stagger, P.T. nailer, threaded stud welded, machine bolt alternate
Maximum steel base plate / bolts — 3/4 DIA threaded stud @ 7-1/4", 5" x 1/4" PLT, non-shrink grout, plan view bolt pattern, APPROVED stamp overlaid
Post over wood beam — Simpson BC post cap, beam per plan, post per plan
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, 326 Flint Ave, Long Beach CA 90814, Project 25-357, Sheet S3.3
